alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 11:41AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Seminole, southeastern Lincoln and northeastern Pottawatomie Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1139 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms extending from Shawnee to Johnson and Prague. The storms are moving northeast at 25 mph. Heavy rainfall will also reduce visibility to below 1 mile at times. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Tecumseh, Prague, Johnson, Centerview and Aydelotte. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 182 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
